name: incidents-on-route-list-front-end;issue-lt-475-issue-lt-167-journey-planning-regression-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt24-journey-planning-lt-48-trip-plan-a-to-b-capability-lt-24-journey-planning

tags.name: LT 24 Journey Planning/LT-48 Trip Plan A to B

title: Incidents on route list front end

userStory.storyName: LT-48 Trip Plan A to B

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then I should see default text displays as "Enter origin or place of interest" in the input field
Then I should see default text displays as "Enter destination or place of interest" in the input field
When I click on "Origin" input field
Then I should see "My current location" option displays in dropdown
When I click on "Destination" input field
Then I should see "My current location" option displays in dropdown
When I enter origin address as "34 Albert St, North Parramatta"
When I select "34 Albert St, North Parramatta" from the suggested match
When I type three character of destination as "par"

Then I should see suggested matches from TripPlanner API in real time
| Location_Matches |
| Par Cl, Pymble |
| Par Pl, Coffs Harbour |
| Par St, Glenroy (2640) |
When I select "Par Cl, Pymble" from the suggested match
Then I should see "Reverse" button is displaying
Then I should see "Clear" button is displaying
Then I should see "Pin A" and "Pin B" in the map
Then I should see hazard list on the planned trip
When I select incident name with "westbound on-ramp to M2 Motorway, West Pennant Hills" from the list
Then user should see incident "title" as "Scheduled Roadwork Northconnex" and "headline" as "Scheduled Roadwork"
Then date range "Thu 9 Jan 2020 till Fri 14 Feb 2020" for planned incidents should display
And headline for the incident should display as "Pennant Hills Road westbound on-ramp to M2 Motorway"
When I click "Back" button
Then I should see hazard list on the planned trip
